projects.title: Glitzy Store
projects.description: Glitzy Store is a sleek e-commerce platform, expertly developed using Tailwind CSS and React, featuring stunning animations for an enhanced user experience.

projects.title: Raj (Client Portfolio)
projects.description: I designed and developed a captivating portfolio website using React, SASS, and Framer Motion, with best animations and dynamic image galleries.

projects.title: Self Info HUB
projects.description: Self Info Hub is a portfolio project showcasing my initial work, featuring unique layouts, multiple themes, and responsive design across various screens.

projects.title: Crypto HUB
projects.description: Crypto Hub, a second poject for portfolio in which I used API's of CoinGego exchange to fetch the data about different top exchanges and top coins in the World. It's responsive too.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: The main PORTFOLIO project, in this project I have used different concepts and some special effects. A cool looking project in my point of view.
